import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {link} from 'react-router-dom' const endpoint = 'http:localhost:3000/api' const Showproduct = () => { const [product, setproduct] = useState([]) const [count, setcount] = useState(0) useEffect ( () =>{ getAllproducts() }, []) const getAllproducts = async () => { const response = await axios.get('${endpoint}/products') setproduct(response) } const eliminarProduct = async (id) =>{ axios.delete('${endpoint}/product/${id}') getAllproducts() } return (
Crear {product.map( (product))}
Descripcion Stock Precio
{product.descripcion} {product.stock} {product.precio} Editar
) } export default Showproduct
